notes:
## 🛡️ Early Game: [Crowd Pleaser](item_ae569e40-3194-4681-b1da-c664d0fa982c)

- **Why:**  
  - Safer, steady healing in early rounds  
  - Helps keep your team alive while you build up your economy

## ⚙️ Optional:  [Mixtape](item_95c95a51-50f2-4ae3-850b-e2947a95b1ce)  Vs Ana
  - If the enemy team has an Ana and you don’t have a cleanse (like Kiriko), consider picking [Mixtape](item_95c95a51-50f2-4ae3-850b-e2947a95b1ce) instead.
  - Mixtape lets you conserve healing while anti-healed—stay on Speed Boost during grenade, then swap to Healing Boost to burst heal your team after the anti-heal wears off.
  - **Coordinate with your team to focus Ana first.** Removing her early is key, since her anti-heal can shut down your healing and swing fights.

## ⚙️ Optional:  [Sonic Boom](item_e0a58a96-c17f-4c99-ba06-8daaa5fd5508) 

- It's now the best healing power on paper due to nerfs on  [Crowd Pleaser](item_ae569e40-3194-4681-b1da-c664d0fa982c) .
- Its value comes from consistently dealing damage. To get the most out of it, you should be constantly poking enemies and shooting shields.
- If that aggressive, damage-focused style fits you, take Sonic Boom. If you prefer focusing purely on survival and positioning, the reliable burst from  [Crowd Pleaser](item_ae569e40-3194-4681-b1da-c664d0fa982c)  will feel more effective.
---

## 💡 Fundamentals & Mindset

- Good positioning and smart ability use matter more than stacking AP.
- Survivability upgrades have the biggest impact—outhealing comes from staying alive and using abilities well.
- Stay alert for flankers (e.g., Genji, Reaper): ping and boop them away if they dive, but don’t overextend.
- **Attitude is everything:** The biggest difference-maker is sticking to your fundamentals even when tilted. Don’t throw or give up when things go wrong—higher-ranked players always play to win, no matter the situation. Keep your energy up and focus on your own gameplay, not what others are doing.

---

## 🗺️ Map Knowledge & Positioning

- Take time to study each Stadium map to learn the best angles for healing, cover, and escape routes.
- Knowing where to position yourself lets you maximize Crossfade value, stay safe from enemy focus, and quickly rotate to support teammates.
- Look for spots that let you heal multiple allies while staying near walls or cover for fast escapes and boop plays.
- Use the custom workshop code [YV9KG](https://workshop.codes/YV9KG) to freely explore Stadium maps, practice movement, and find the best healing and escape routes.
- Mastering map angles is just as important as mechanics—great positioning turns good healing into game-winning impact.

---

## 🎥 Standard Lucio Gameplay: Positioning & Team Impact

This clip shows classic Lucio play—constantly shifting between supporting the frontline and peeling for teammates under threat. Key fundamentals on display:

- Proactively peels for Ashe by shutting down a Genji flank, then quickly rotates back to the tank.
- Helps Junker Queen pressure the enemy frontline and joins her in a coordinated dive on the enemy backline.
- Demonstrates Lucio’s value in always moving to where he’s needed most—applying pressure, protecting teammates, and enabling plays.

[YouTube Video](https://youtube.com/embed/e-W2-cWDUis)

**Key takeaway:**  
Lucio doesn’t need to be flying around the map at all times; smart positioning and timely rotations are what make him truly effective.

Due to Crowdpleaser nerfs, try to use it while Amp’d. It’s not always possible, but time it when you can.

notes:
## 🏅 Core Item Priority

- **Start with [#1 Single](item_5c5d5331-2966-440b-b989-aa92187eef97) and [Vital-E-Tee](item_b92e6f1d-3aac-4eec-b027-00c8e1529016).**
  - This combo gives you solid healing and extra armor early on.
  - **DPS heroes will have a much harder time picking you off**—you’ll be noticeably tougher to burst down or finish off in early fights.

round_upgrades.notes: Grab if you're getting constantly negative effected
Due to Crowdpleaser nerfs, try to use it while Amp’d. It’s not always possible, but time it when you can.

notes:
## 🎚️ Core Defense & Sustain

- **Pick [Lumerico Fusion Drive](item_3da81000-333c-460a-a1a2-09441bfda9c8) as the core of your defense.**
  - Every time you use an ability (boop or amp), you regenerate **50 armor**.
  - With this setup, you’ll have a total of **210 armor** that keeps coming back, making you even tougher for DPS to pick off.

---

## 🎮 Playstyle

- Now you can **double boop** for increased healing and to keep your armor topped up.
- Poke more confidently and help pressure enemy tanks and DPS, but always stay close enough to support your team.
- **Your main value:** Keep your team alive and use your survivability to turn the tide in fights.

---

## 🎥 Overwatch Stadium Pro Showcase:
[YouTube Video](https://youtube.com/embed/qE7pap-dEJY)

notes:
## ⏳ Crossfade Duration Spike

- This round, prioritize **[All-Out Auditiva](item_7e33b7e7-4f7a-4f9f-bc25-39ce2a8f56b2)** to maximize your Crossfade healing.
- Since the Crossfade buff, stacking ability power and extending Amp It Up is now the best way to boost your team’s sustain.
- If you’re struggling to survive, you can still flex a survival item, but **All-Out Auditiva** is ideal for a full healing build.

## 🎮 Playstyle

- With All-Out Auditiva, focus on keeping your team in your aura and using Amp It Up as often as possible for huge healing spikes.
- Prioritize positioning and rotations to maximize aura uptime for your team.
- Survival still matters—adapt if you’re getting focused, but aim for as much Crossfade value as possible.

round_upgrades.notes: Extra over-health that stacks well with your kit

notes:
## 💎 Ultimate Charge Power-Up

- Just when you thought it couldn’t get better—**boom!** Now you have insane ult charge with [Catalytic Crystal](item_3e3f4f77-cdf8-4dda-a5b0-2fb9390aefc4).
  - Your ultimate will be up way more often, giving you tons of opportunities to counter enemy pushes or make aggressive plays.

---

### 🎮 Playstyle

- Don’t just save Beat Drop for emergencies—use it proactively to engage, break stalemates, or secure objectives, knowing you’ll get it back quickly.
- Coordinate with your tank and team for maximum impact, whether you’re pushing in or holding defensively.
- Keep up the tempo: frequent Beat Drops let your team play more aggressively and survive longer in every fight.

### 🤓 Tip
- After activating Beat Drop, there’s a brief “grace period” (about 1 second) where allies who quickly move into your area of effect can still receive shields.  
  **If you use your ult in a less-than-ideal spot, reposition fast to catch more teammates in this window.**

---

## 🎥 Offensive Sound Barrier & Team Engagement

This clip demonstrates how to turn Lucio’s ultimate into a game-winning engage tool:

- Uses Sound Barrier to lead the team into the enemy’s cover, breaking the deadlock and overwhelming their defense.
- Combines Speed Boost with Beat Drop for a coordinated push that catches the enemy off guard and secures point control.
- Shows the power of switching between offensive and defensive ult usage—sometimes the best defense is a strong offense.

[YouTube Video](https://youtube.com/embed/peWm9SUR-gI)

**Key takeaway:**  
Don’t be afraid to use Sound Barrier to start fights, not just save them. Pairing it with Speed Boost for a fast, decisive engage can break enemy lines and win objectives, especially when both teams are poking from cover. Adapt your ult usage to the situation for maximum impact.

This will literally carry games..

notes:
## 🚀 Cooldown Acceleration

- **Add [Biotech Maximizer](item_01c6dcb3-d2e2-4c57-bd21-61d7b8f939c4) for 20% cooldown reduction on Amp It Up and Boop.**
  - **BUG NOTE:** Currently, this item is bugged and does not apply its cooldown reduction to  [Crowd Pleaser](item_ae569e40-3194-4681-b1da-c664d0fa982c) , but it still applies to Amp It Up.
  - We still build it because the reduced cooldown on Amp It Up is crucial, and this build will be even stronger once the bug is fixed.
  - With Amp It Up coming up more often, you’ll have even more healing for your team.

---

## 💭 Personal Thought

- This round is more of a flex pick—choose whatever item you believe will help you stay with your team and contest the point most effectively.
- Personally, I like to grab an extra survival or utility item here, depending on what the enemy team is doing. 
- Trust your read of the match—prioritize what will keep you alive and enable you to support your team in the thick of the fight

*This approach gives you the flexibility to adapt to the flow of the game, ensuring you’re always contributing where it matters most.*

---

## 🎮 Playstyle

- Keep working towards your end build and use your increased utility to control the tempo of each engagement.

notes:
## 🌈 Final Form: Peak Aura!
![Image](https://media2.giphy.com/media/v1.Y2lkPTc5MGI3NjExa2F2eDdhY3NjbnQxMHliYXBrcmRzb3RsZ3BocjNzOXZob2F4Y25yZSZlcD12MV9pbnRlcm5hbF9naWZfYnlfaWQmY3Q9Zw/jOZt5tdGYxzz0H6Nfi/giphy.gif)

- **[Iridescent Iris](item_b7fb28ef-ce82-416b-8693-01c274f8df4e):**  
  +10% cooldown reduction and +20% ability power— total of 30% CD.

- **[Megaphone](item_d995adf3-1789-4a16-b85c-21b8c14e4f7d):**  
  Since the Crossfade buff, we build Megaphone to extend our aura and maximize team healing by keeping more teammates in range.

---

## 🛡️ Swap Options for Survival & Utility

You can replace [Iridescent Iris](item_b7fb28ef-ce82-416b-8693-01c274f8df4e) with any of these, depending on what the enemy team is throwing at you:

- **Ogundimu Reduction Field:**  
  Best if you’re being focused by hitscan or beam heroes and need to ramp up durability in long fights.

- **Crusader Hydraulics:**  
  Great budget pick against heavy weapon damage for simple, always-on protection.

- **Nebula Conduit:**  
  Ideal if you’re getting hit by big ability bursts or combos, letting you survive spikes and recover with strong healing.

- **Cybervenom:**  
  Ideal if key targets arent dying fast enough, boop and engage with your team for max value.
---

## 🎮 Playstyle

- **Prioritize farming your ultimate:** With constant cooldowns, you can have Beat Drop up nearly every fight—use it to swing key moments.
- **Spam Amp It Up and Boop:** Maximize healing, armor regen, and pressure. If you have Cybervenom, make sure to boop targets that are being pocket-healed to apply anti-heal and help secure eliminations.
- **Play aggressively but smart:** Use your mobility and boops to disrupt, contest space, and peel for teammates, but don’t overextend.
- **Adapt your final item slot** to match the biggest threat each round—swap between survival and utility as needed.
